attributes.action: Leave Britannia on the 50 pence coin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe Britannia should be left where she is on our 50 pence coin. She has been part of our heritage for hundreds of years and needs to be left alone. Please sign the petition and save one of the last things British.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
